Topics

  • Popular – these are the posts people keep coming back to.
  • Weeknotes – notes about my working week, written for me but shared in the open.
  • General – uncategorised things.
  • Notes – scribblings, often inspired by something I’ve read, seen or heard.
  • Bookmarks – things I’ve read recently.
  • Product management – thoughts on product thinking, techniques, tools and anything related to product management.
  • Working in the open – things I’ve written about sharing your work online and why it's good.
  • Design – covering techniques, tools, the basics and thoughts on interaction design, service design and design thinking.
  • Data – things I’ve written about data.
  • Agile delivery – tools and techniques for managing agile delivery teams.
  • Digital government – thoughts on digital government.
  • Run-notes – notes about my running and long distance training.

Steve Messer's website. Product manager. Web enthusiast, working in the open. Black Country boy living in London, UK.
